name: MEC Pack Away Sun Cap - Unisex
description:
A cap to shelter you from sun and light rain. And it has a secret! It stuffs into a hidden compartment in the crown so you can store it in your pocket or top of your pack.Made from nylon fabric with DWR and UPF 50+ finish for weather protection.Soft polyester sweatband keeps sweat out of your eyes.Foam brim is packable yet holds its shape to shade you from the sun.Stuffs into hidden pack-away pocket in crown.

        Sustainability
